overview: Tiffany is having one of THOSE kind of dreams. . . sexual fantasies, wet dreams of a sensual desire. She must tell someone but she doesn't want them to stop. Watch her as she goes from one erotic fantasy to another, and leads the cast of beautiful people through her sexual adventures. Tiffany wants you to join her, for she is LIVING IN A WET DREAM!
title: Living in a Wet Dream
